Message: The user completes the submission of the form

I signed up through the link sent by Voluum to claim my $500 NewsBreak ad credits as a bonus for attending the webinar "The Winning Formula for Health Ads”. But no ad credits added to my NewsBreak account.

I'm sorry to hear that you're having trouble with your ad credits. To help resolve this, could you please confirm if you've completed all the necessary steps for claiming the ad credits? Sometimes, there might be specific conditions or steps required to activate the credits. If everything seems correct on your end, I recommend reaching out to our support team at adsupport@newsbreak.com with details of your account and any confirmation emails you received from Voluum. They'll be able to assist you further.
Great! If you have any other questions or need further assistance, feel free to ask. I'm here to help!
